panels.description: Logs filtered by Namespace and Workload that contain the words "error" or "warn"

targets.expr: {namespace="$namespace", app=~"$workload"} |~ "(?i)(warn|error)"

panels.title: Log warning and errors

panels.description: Flux resources that are currently in a failed state

targets.expr: sum by (kind, name) (gotk_reconcile_condition{exported_namespace="$namespace", namespace="flux-system", type="Ready", status="False", kind=~"Kustomization|HelmRelease"})
sum by (kind, name) (gotk_suspend_status{exported_namespace="$namespace", kind=~"Kustomization|HelmRelease"})

panels.title: Flux status

panels.description: How much CPU is being used compared to what is guaranteed (requested) and the maximum allowed (limit)
panels.title: CPU Quota

panels.description: How much memory is being used compared to guaranteed amount (requested) vs maximum (limit)
panels.title: Memory Quota

panels.description: The percentage of 2xx, 4xx and 5xx response codes

targets.expr: sum by(exported_service) (rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_service=~"$workload", status=~"5.+"}[5m])) / sum by(exported_service) (rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_service=~"$workload"}[5m]))

panels.title: Response code distribution

panels.description: The rate of requests that result in 5xx status codes

targets.expr: sum by (exported_service) (rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_service=~"$workload", status=~"5.+"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (exported_service) (rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_service=~"$workload"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Ingress error rate (5xx)

panels.description: Total time taken for NGINX and upstream servers to process a request and send a response. Logarithmic scale.
panels.title: Total request handling time

panels.description: The rate of requests for the past 24h hours

targets.expr: sum by (exported_service) (rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace="menigais", exported_service=~"$workload"}[5m])) > 0

panels.title: Ingress request throughput

panels.description: Average upstream service latency per Ingress. This is the time it takes for the NGINX server to get a response from the upstream server (backend service). Logarithmic scale.
panels.title: Upstream latency (avg)

targets.expr:
(
  sum(rate(http_server_duration_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", http_route="admin/v{v:apiVersion}/System/ping", le="250"}[1m])) by (job)
+
  sum(rate(http_server_duration_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", http_route="admin/v{v:apiVersion}/System/ping", le="2500"}[1m])) by (job)
) / 2 / sum(rate(http_server_duration_ms_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", http_route="admin/v{v:apiVersion}/System/ping"}[1m])) by (job)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_server_duration_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", http_route="admin/v{v:apiVersion}/System/ping", http_status_code="204"}[1m])) by (le))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_server_duration_ms_bucket{namespace="$namespace", job="$job", http_route="admin/v{v:apiVersion}/System/ping", http_status_code="0"}[1m])) by (le))
process_runtime_dotnet_timer_count{job="$job", namespace="$namespace"}
process_runtime_dotnet_thread_pool_threads_count{namespace="$namespace"}
rate(process_runtime_dotnet_thread_pool_completed_items_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job"}[1m])
rate(process_runtime_dotnet_monitor_lock_contention_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job"}[1m])
rate(process_runtime_dotnet_timer_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$job"}[1m])
process_runtime_dotnet_thread_pool_queue_length{namespace="$namespace", job="$job"}
